DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two anti-HIV drug , FTC lamivudine ( 3TC ) , give either stavudine ( d4T ) zidovudine ( ZDV ) one anti-HIV drug .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing FTC Lamivudine HIV-Infected Patients Stable Anti-HIV Drug Combination
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomize one two arm 2:1 ratio ( weighted Arm 1 ) . Arm 1 : Replace lamivudine FTC continue current background regimen . Arm 2 : Continue current lamivudine-containing regimen . Patients stratify base upon screen plasma HIV-1 RNA background therapy . Stratum 1 : Less 50 copies/ml ; PI ( protease inhibitor ) treatment regimen . Stratum 2 : Less 50 copies/ml ; NNRTI ( nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ) treatment regimen . Stratum 3 : 50-400 copies/ml ; PI treatment regimen . Stratum 4 : 50-400 copies/ml ; NNRTI treatment regimen . Clinic visit occur regular interval throughout 48-week study period determine viral load .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria You may eligible study : Are least 18 year old . Are HIVpositive . Have viral load 400 copies/ml . Agree use barrier method birth control ( condom ) study . Have take one follow antiHIV drug combination : ( 1 ) 3TC plus d4T ZDV plus protease inhibitor ( PI ) least 8 week , ( 2 ) 3TC plus d4T ZDV plus nonnucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NNRTI ) least 12 week . ( You must show date start combination . ) Exclusion Criteria You eligible study : Have severe diarrhea unable eat much need due nausea , vomit , stomachache within 30 day study entry . Have serious medical event within 30 day prior study entry . Are take hydroxyurea . Have Grade 2 high peripheral neuropathy . Abuse alcohol drug . Are pregnant breastfeeding .
